name: @sammas/css
description: CSS implementing the principles of Seznam.cz's design system Sammas.

scripts.build:css: mkdir dist && lessc src/sammas.less dist/sammas-${npm_package_version}.css --autoprefix="> 1%, last 2 versions, not ie 10"
scripts.build:minified: npm run build:css && lessc src/sammas.less dist/sammas-${npm_package_version}.min.css --clean-css="--s1 --advanced" --autoprefix="> 1%, last 2 versions, not ie 10"
scripts.build: npm run clear && npm run build:minified && cp -a -R src/. dist/ && cp package.json dist && cp README.md dist
